thread.title: Bryant leaves Lakers' exhibition with bruised left leg
thread.title_full: Bryant leaves Lakers' exhibition with bruised left leg

title: Bryant leaves Lakers' exhibition with bruised left leg
text:
Share Updated: 10/13 9:33 pm 
LAS VEGAS (AP) â€” Kobe Bryant has left the Lakers' exhibition game at the MGM Grand against Sacramento with a bruised left leg and will not return. 
Bryant appeared to be kneed on a second-half drive to the basket and went to the locker room. The Lakers called his injury a left lower-leg contusion. 
Bryant is returning after missing most of the last two seasons with knee and shoulder injuries. He finished with 10 points on 4-of-12 shooting Tuesday.
